tachyon.client.block

Class LocalBlockOutStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.OutputStream
      • tachyon.client.block.BufferedBlockOutStream
        • tachyon.client.block.LocalBlockOutStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, Flushable, AutoCloseable, Cancelable

    public final class LocalBlockOutStream
extends BufferedBlockOutStream
    Provides a streaming API to write to a Tachyon block. This output stream will directly write the input to a file in local Tachyon storage. The instances of this class should only be used by one thread and are not thread safe.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class tachyon.client.block.BufferedBlockOutStream

    • Method Detail

      • cancel

        public void cancel()
            throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: Cancelable
        Cancels the write to Tachyon storage. This will delete all the temporary data and metadata that has been written to the worker(s). This method should be called when a write is aborted.
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is a failure when the worker invalidates the cache attempt

      • unBufferedWrite

        protected void unBufferedWrite(byte[] b,
                   int off,
                   int len)
                        throws IOException
        Description copied from class: BufferedBlockOutStream
        Writes the data in the byte array directly to the backing store. This should only be used for writes which would not be able to be buffered.
        Specified by:
        unBufferedWrite in class BufferedBlockOutStream
        Parameters:
        b - the data that should be written
        off - the offset into the data to start writing from
        len - the length to write
        Throws:
        IOException - if the write does not succeed
